name: Master of Calamity (Toy Course Version)
description:
Description:  

You are a master of calamity.

Your area of influence is inhabited by weak spheroids, but they have polluted their environment to a point that they die more frequently to it than to your calamities! 

The God Emperor of calamity has issued a decree, you will lose your job if you can't gather more fear from those spheroids than their environment creates...
